query.value: SELECT cmis:name, cmis:parentId, cmis:path, cmis:allowedChildObjectTypeIds FROM cmis:folder where IN_FOLDER('%s') AND cmis:name = 'subFolder'
SELECT cmis:name, cmis:objectId, cmis:lastModifiedBy, cmis:creationDate, cmis:contentStreamFileName FROM cmis:document where IN_FOLDER('%s') AND cmis:name = 'fourthFile'
SELECT cmis:parentId FROM cmis:folder where IN_FOLDER('%s')
SELECT * FROM cmis:document where IN_FOLDER('%s') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC
SELECT * FROM cmis:document where IN_FOLDER('%s') ORDER BY cmis:name DESC
SELECT * FROM cmis:folder where IN_FOLDER('%s') ORDER BY cmis:lastModificationDate ASC
SELECT * FROM cmis:folder where IN_FOLDER('%s') ORDER BY cmis:lastModificationDate DESC
SELECT * FROM cmis:document where IN_FOLDER('%s') ORDER BY cmis:createdBy DESC
SELECT * FROM cmis:document where IN_FOLDER('%s') AND cmis:name IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM cmis:folder where IN_FOLDER('%s') AND cmis:name IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM cmis:document where IN_FOLDER('%s') AND cmis:name LIKE 'fourthFile'
SELECT * FROM cmis:folder where IN_FOLDER('%s') AND NOT(cmis:name NOT IN ('subFolder'))
SELECT * FROM cmis:document where IN_FOLDER('%s') AND cmis:name IN ('fourthFile', 'fifthFile.txt')
SELECT * FROM cmis:document where IN_FOLDER('%s') AND cmis:name NOT IN ('fourthFile', 'fifthFile.txt')
SELECT * FROM cmis:folder where IN_FOLDER('%s') AND cmis:name <> 'subFolder'
SELECT cmis:secondaryObjectTypeIds FROM cmis:folder where IN_FOLDER('%s') AND cmis:name = 'subFolder'
SELECT * FROM cmis:document AS d JOIN cm:titled as a0 ON d.cmis:objectId = a0.cmis:objectId WHERE CONTAINS(a0, 'cm:title:"fourthFileTitle"')
